title: PlugMonkey's XUnfollow Pro
description:
PlugMonkey's XUnfollow Pro is a robust Chrome extension that helps you clean up and manage your 𝕏 (X.com or Twitter formerly) feed with robust search and filtering. Free for 10 accounts weekly, unlimited with Pro.

Experience a streamlined 𝕏 feed with XUnfollow Pro's advanced features, including search by name, username, and bio, filtering by follower count and last posted date, bulk unfollow, and a user-friendly interface. The Lifetime PRO version unlocks all features for unlimited access.
